text: Naglaa Ali Mahmoud (, born 4 July 1962) wife fifth President of Egypt, Mohamed Morsi. She was the First Lady of Egypt from 2012 to 2013. Naglaa rejected the title of First Lady. She wanted to be called the "First Servant". ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of Egypt
title: Naglaa Mahmoud
